meanings.definition: A device that temporarily prevents the movement of a mechanism
meanings.sent1: The detent in the lock kept the door from swinging open.
meanings.sent2: The detent on the gear prevented it from shifting unexpectedly.
meanings.sent3: The detent decided to take a break and stop the clock for a minute.
meanings.sent4: Her determination acted like a detent, halting her progress momentarily.
meanings.sent5: The detent clicked into place, securing the wheel in position.

meanings.definition: A mechanism that holds a part in place until released
meanings.sent1: The detent in the watch kept the hands from moving until pressed.
meanings.sent2: Press the detent to release the spring-loaded latch.
meanings.sent3: The detent held the secret compartment closed until the right button was pressed.
meanings.sent4: His promise was like a detent, keeping her emotions in check until he broke it.
meanings.sent5: The detent acted like a tiny guardian, ensuring the piece stayed in place until needed.
